dialogue.name: Fayruz
dialogue.text: <color=red>Alright, guys.</color> This is it. Just one audition between us and a spot in the Concert of Cleansing. <color=yellow>The biggest stage in the world.

dialogue.name: Sonu
dialogue.text: We can do this, we can do this... we can do this, right?

dialogue.name: Fayruz
dialogue.text: We'll nail it, Sonu. We just have to do what we always do...
